newsitem.title: ALBANIA: Germany's Preussag offers Albania $83 mln chrome deal.
newsitem.headline: Germany's Preussag offers Albania $83 mln chrome deal.

text.p: Germany's Preussag AG has offered to invest $83 million in Albania to exploit its rich chrome reserves and upgrade its ailing mining industry, the country's mining ministry said on Friday.
"The contract is at the Ministry of Privatisation. Preussag has said it is ready to sign the contract," the ministry said in a statement.
As part of the contract, Preussag wanted to invest some $30 million in the northern Bulqiza chrome mine and a ferrochromium smelting plant in the nearby town of Burrel, it added.
Preussag increased its offer to $83 million to help upgrade Albania's ailing but potentially lucrative chrome industry from an original $50 million offered last May.
